entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
